pihi anumakata lakwa landan nuwara margayaka wati siti shri lankika tharunayek jiwithakshayata pathwa athi bawa wides madhya wartha karanawa.arunesh thangaraja namathi 28 hawiridi tharunayek melesa jiwithakshayata pathwa athi bawa sandahan.pihi anum praharayakata lakwa tharunayaku margayaka wati sitina bawata eeye (20) aluyama erata aarakshaka ansha wetha thorathurak labi thibenawa.lada thorathurata anuwa adala sthanayata aarakshaka niladharin saha saukhya ansha paminena witath adala tharunaya miyagos siti bawayi wartha wanne.meya ghathanayak bawa salaka polis parikshana aarambhakara athi athara siddhiyata sakapita 44 hawiridi pudgalayeku athadanguwata gena athi bawa wides madhya wadiduratath wartha karanawa.miyagiya tharunayage pashchath marana parikshanaya ada (21) dina sidukirimata niyamithawa thibu bawa sandahan.
